subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Teixeira scored in the first half and Fernandinho doubled the lead early in the second to give host Shakhtar Donetsk a 2-1 victory over the defending champion Chelsea in the Champions League.
snippet: Teixeira scored in the first half and Fernandinho doubled the lead early in the second to give host Shakhtar Donetsk a 2-1 victory over the defending champion Chelsea in the Champions League.
